title: Railworks TS2014 SSS Road and Rail Sound Pack
description:
The Road and Rail Sound Enhancement Pack brings forth many realism fixes that have been needed for a long time for Train Simulator.

The choice of which enhancements you want to install and to which DLCs etc you want to install them is entirely yours, as each one has an .rwp for each DLC (and the core game) that you can apply individually. Each one will work totally independently, so there is no need to install any requirements for any of the fixes.




Please support the developers and buy some of their content if you can afford it.


Please use the email address or the facebook fanpage for requests, questions and also if you want to share an addon with the community which we will post on your behalf.

If you would like to contribute, please read the Readme.pdf.




A Team tpb_4_ever upload.
